title: No precedent the way PM fought case of Holy Prophet SAW: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 19 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain said on Monday that there was no precedent for the way Prime Minister Imran Khan has fought the case of the Holy Prophet Hazrat Muhammad (S.A.W).
The minister tagged the video of Prime Minister Imran Khan’s speech in United Nations General Assembly in September 2019.
#PMImranKhan ناموس رسالتٌ کا مقدمہ جس طرح عمران خان نے لڑا ہے اس کی مثال نہیں ملتی pic.twitter.com/PWcyHKe83p
— Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) April 19, 2021
